 # copy the config, enable the site
{{{
$ sudo cp api.conf /etc/apache2/sites-available/api
$ sudo a2ensite api
$ sudo a2enmod apreq
}}}
 # add this line to your default-ssl site (or default if you're not using TLS)
{{{
<IfModule mod_ssl.c>
<VirtualHost _default_:443>
+      PerlRequire /opt/cif/bin/webapi.pl
....
}}}
 # add the www-data user to the cif group (or whatever group you've created for this app)
